body: A blood-streaked, shirtless man wanted for stabbing a roommate was killed in a hail of gunfire by two police officers on a Brooklyn street yesterday when, the police said, he brandished a broken wine bottle, advanced on them as they backed away, ignored their orders to drop it and finally lunged at them. In a face-off witnessed by two other
title: Police Kill a Man Armed With a Broken Bottle

body: DECARLO--Joseph S., of Brooklyn on November 7, 2007. Devoted husband of Leonor. Loving father of Deborah and loving stepfather of Vilma and David. Cherished grandfather of Gianna, Jonathan, Marissa, Carla, Isabel, David, Carlos and Daniel. Loving brother of Lydia, David, James, and Benjamin. Dedicated and loyal employee of the New York Times for 35
title: Paid Notice: Deaths DECARLO, JOSEPH S.
